Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland comes into a matchup with Brooklyn as winners of 10 straight games.
The Cavaliers finished 48-34 overall and 31-21 in Eastern Conference play a season ago, averaging 7.4 steals, 4.6 blocks, and 12.7 turnovers per game last season.
The Nets finished 32-50 overall and 24-28 in Eastern Conference action during the 2023-24 season, allowing opponents to score 113.3 points per game and shoot 47.0% from the field last season.
Injuries: Cavaliers: Emoni Bates out (knee), Max Strus out (ankle). Nets: Bojan Bogdanovic out (foot), Day'Ron Sharpe out (hamstring), Trendon Watford out (hamstring).
